title: HTML
content: The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

title: CSS
content: Cascading Style Sheets is a simply designed language intended to simplify the process of making web pages presentable.

title: JavaScript
content: JavaScript (JS) is the most popular interpreted compiled programming language. It can be used for both Client-side as well as Server-side developments.

title: React JS
content: ReactJS is an open-source JavaScript library that is used for building user interfaces in a declarative and efficient way.

title: Bootstrap
content: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile-first websites.

title: Python
content: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively.
